<<Grid>
<Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="92*" /> <RowDefinition Height="8*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions>
<ListView SeparatorVisibility="None" ItemsSource="{Binding OutputMessages}" VerticalOptions="FillAndExpand" Grid.Row="0" HasUnevenRows="True" x:Name="ListView" IsEnabled="True" IsPullToRefreshEnabled="True" Refreshing="ListView_OnRefreshing"> <ListView.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <ViewCell> <ViewCell.View> <Frame Padding="5" Margin="8" BackgroundColor="{Binding BackgroundMessageColor}" HasShadow="False" HorizontalOptions="{Binding IsItsUser}"> <Grid RowSpacing="1"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions>
<Label Text="{Binding Name}" Grid.Row="0" FontAttributes="Bold" TextColor="{Binding NameColor}" />
<Label Text="{Binding Text}" Grid.Row="1" FontSize="18" TextColor="{Binding TextColor}" />
<Label Text="{Binding DateTime, StringFormat='{}{0:HH:mm:ss}'}" Grid.Row="2" FontSize="Small" HorizontalOptions="End" TextColor="{Binding TextColor}" /> </Grid> </Frame> </ViewCell.View> </ViewCell> </DataTemplate> </ListView.ItemTemplate> </ListView>
<Grid Row="1" BackgroundColor="##98a4b7"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="90*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="10*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
<Entry Grid.Column="0" Placeholder="Enter your text" BackgroundColor="Transparent" TextColor="WhiteSmoke" PlaceholderColor="WhiteSmoke" x:Name="InputMessage" Completed="Button_OnClicked" />
<ImageButton Grid.Column="1" Source="SendIco.png" Margin="8" BackgroundColor="Transparent" Clicked="Button_OnClicked" /> </Grid> </Grid>.../>
